text: "Good evening. You strike me as someone with cash to spare."
"I do have some cash on hand..."
"Money's pretty tight right now!"
"I wouldn't be here otherwise. Anyone with less than a hundred G's sitting in their pocket isn't worth my time."
"So what are you? Some sort of...traveling salesman?"
"One hundred K is nothing for me."
"Good thing I've got the best prices then. Someone in your line of work needs every edge they can get. I'm here to supply them. Supply...the edges...uh..."
Just tell me what you're selling."

"A customer who lets me do all the talking? Now that I could get used to. I deal in specialty wares. Chiplets, unique abilities, that sort of thing. I'll have a kiosk up and running by the time you come here."
Goodbye!
"Right you are. I travel about, peddling my specialty wares to all who need them."
"Cool! What do you have in stock?"
"I already have access to a shop back at my apartment."
$boughthalfoffchiplet "I don't have my kiosk set up yet. But I *can* sell you this chiplet I have on hand for half off. $25k. One time offer."
"I'll take it." (buy chiplet for $25k)
"Not today."
"What, that shabby corporate outlet? What are even gonna buy there?? A gun??? What are you gonna do with a gun???? Shoot people?????"
"Yeah actually."
"You're right! Who needs guns?"

"Nice doing business with you. I'll have a kiosk set up with more goodies by the time you make it back. Anytime you got a little extra cash, little extra dough, dosh, brouzouf, be sure to take a look at my wares"
Goodbye!
"Suit yourself. If you change your mind, I'll have a kiosk set up by the time you make it back."
Goodbye!
"My shop is waaaay better. I got chiplets and special abilities for sale. These babies things'll let you perform all sorts of cool stuff."
"So how do I buy this stuff?"
"Nah I don't need that stuff."
"Not me! Unless someone wants to buy them from me. In which case, I would need a number of guns equal to or greater than the number they wish to buy."
"If you're not selling guns, what do you have for me?"
"Ho ho, sounds like we got ourselves a BIG SPENDER here. I'm a BIG...a BIG GET SPENDED ON! We're sure to get along fine."
"So what do you have for sale today?"
